column4: After the update to edgy my wifi does not work anymore. Anyone who can help me?
At the moment: none :-) It is a prism2 card which worked fine under 6.06
make sure you have installed all the right packages for it..
http://ubuntuforums.org/showthread.php?t=276538&highlight=prism tells me that I am not alone. Exactly the same problem here.
what do you get when you do iwconfig do you see your device..
find out if the module is loaded for the card.
I see it, it is wlan0 (used to be eth1) but "no wireless extension"
then just do sudo dhclient3 wlna0
then just do sudo dhclient3 wlan0
Which one? Orinoco, hermes, hostap, prism2?
In 6.06 hostap did the trick (WPA), I had to blacklist orinoco and hermes (loaded by default).
All modules --> no wireless extension found
